newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Optus service reaches 96 pct of Australia.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Optus service reaches 96 pct of Australia.

text.p: Australia's second largest telecommunications carrier, Optus Communications Pty Ltd, said on Wednesday its long distance service was now available to about 96 percent of the Australian population.
The remaining four percent were unable to use Optus as they were still connected to rival Telstra Corp's older exchanges. These should be upgraded by mid-1997, Optus said in a statement.
It said the introduction of its long distance service would be completed on Thursday when parts of regional Victoria and Tasmania gained access to the service.
